channel.title: Add your SC link to your disco profile please
channel.description:
I don‚Äôt know about you but I actually so often click on the disco bio and the SoundCloud link in it. That makes stuff just easy. findig NO LINK just makes me sad and scream at random people in the subway.
Ain‚Äôt nobody want that ;) üòè
So here‚Äôs to community responsibility my friends: update your disco bio and SC link and do good to daily commuters in Berlin ;)
